Game.Name: Pawly Pets- My Pet Hotel
Game.Plot: My Pet Hotel for Nintendo DS will fulfil all your wishes of taking care of your favourite pets horses, dogs, cats, rabbits, budgies, and tortoises. Only you are responsible for the well-being of the animals, whose owners have entrusted them to you. Take the best care you can of your four-legged and feathered guests: feed them, keep their enclosures clean, play with them, get new toys for them, and ride the horses in the countryside. You will build your own pet hotel based on your ideas in exciting scenarios of a realistic 3D world with various different levels of difficulty, in order to provide a good and protected place to stay for the pets.
